title: The Importance of Irrigation: Basics Biology and Best Practices

tasks.task: Webinar presented by Shea Donald and Marisol Camacho about irrigation essentials in greenhouse facilities.
subtasks: Define drought stress and its effects on crop development.

tasks.task: Explain factors influencing irrigation system planning.
subtasks: Discuss the role of lights in greenhouse environments.

tasks.task: Address preventative measures for irrigation system design.
subtasks: Highlight the importance of sustainable irrigation practices.

tasks.task: Emphasize the role of partners in providing holistic solutions.
